mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clazz (name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject,status,create_time,update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update clazz set name = #{name}, room=#{room},begin_date=#{beginDate},end_date=#{endDate},master_id=#{masterId},subject=#{subject},update_time=#{updateTime},status=#{status} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select c.*,e.name master_name from clazz c,emp e where c.id = #{id} and e.id= c.master_id;
